attributes.action: outlaw all forms of paying for human companionship and escorting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today many people in The UK are commiting acts of robbery against HM Inland Revenue due to the moral and legal ambiguity of the escorting industry. 

While few legitimate agencies actually do just sell human company for social reasons, the nation suffer because these companies capitalise on peoples selfish paranoia of committing a social taboo of being seen single at a business or social function.

The nation pay in the form of hundreds - upon - thousands of  ‘ agencies ’ and individuals prostituting and human trafficking themselves and others across the country and even abroad all in the name of 
‘escorting’ and selling ‘non sexual liaisons’ to paying ‘clients’. 

We have strict laws against human trafficking and prostitution and this industry is used 95% of the time to cheat this law. In effect: The Government is being robbed, the people are being exploited and prostitution is rife.

We the signed petitioners urge the Prime Minister to outlaw any form of paying for human companionship so as to safe guard public health and morals and deliver a paralyzing blow to organised crime.

*Petition created and submitted in memory of our beloved dog Sam 1993-2008

rejection.details: If you would like to resubmit please take out the reference to your dog - which has no relevance to the petition.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
